title: Mini DV, 1080P High Definition Pixel 140° Wide Angle Lens 360° Rotate Bracket IR Night Vision DV, Excellent Present Sports Portable Camera DV(Blue)

【Small and Compact】You can easily monitor homes, bedrooms, a garage, a hotel room, an office, your kid’s nursery, or anywhere else you need protection. It’s also battery powered easy to set up, so you can use it as a body or sports cam, to record nannies, pets, children, or elderly and caregivers, and ensure you’re a step ahead of any dangers in your life

【Wide Applicability】1080P high definition pixel and 140° wide angle lens. Mini size, suitable for all occasions such as having lessons, meeting, taking part in concert, and interviewing, etc. This dv can be used for housekeepers or a nanny, baby, pet, personal security, professional surveillance, body safety or action and drone use. IR night vision, suitable for night too
